Text: how do i switch the audio track, im using the miro player and i can get the english subtitles to work but not the audio track can anyone help?
nevermind, i just had to download a media player that doesn't suck, english track is working perfectly

gino2561, I recommend using KLMCP (K-Lite Mega Codec Pack) v6.9.0 or newer -- it includes almost every codec anyone would need (except Adobe SWF and RealMedia and QuickTime, but those could be installed separately by installing RealAlternative and QTLite) also Media Player Classic Home Cinema 1.4.1.x -- the default key to switch to another audio track is A (Next Audio), but sometimes (when playing OGM files) you need to configure also key for "Next Audio (OGM)".
For people who don't know how to play MKV files, just download the cracked version of AVS Video converter and convert it to an AVI file.
Can someone seed this again please? thanks.
